com.neovisionaries.zookeeper

Class NodeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.zookeeper.NodeReader

  • public class NodeReader
extends Object
    Znode reader. If the target znode to read does not exist when start() method is called, this implementation waits for the target znode to be created and then reads its content. 
     // Prepare a ZooKeeper instance.
 ZooKeeper zooKeeper = ...

 // The path of the target znode to read.
 String path = ...

 // Prepare a Listener implementation.
 NodeReader.NodeReader.Listener listener = new NodeReader.Listener() {
     @Override
     public void onRead(NodeReader reader, byte[] data, Stat stat) {
         System.out.println("Successfully read the znode.");
     }

     @Override
     public void onGaveUp(NodeReader reader) {
         System.out.println("Gave up reading the znode.");
     }
 };

 // Read the target znode.
 new NodeReader()
     .setZooKeeper(zooKeeper)
     .setPath(path)
     .setListener(listener)
     .start();
    Since:
    1.2

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NodeReader.Adapter
      An empty implementation of NodeReader.Listener interface.
      static interface  NodeReader.Listener
      Listener interface to receive the result of reading.

        public org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper getZooKeeper()

      • setZooKeeper

        public NodeReader setZooKeeper(org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper zooKeeper)
        Set the ZooKeeper instance to read the target znode.

        If no ZooKeeper instance is set when start() is called, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        zooKeeper - A ZooKeeper instance.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • start

        public NodeReader start()
        Start reading the target znode.
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException -
        • No ZooKeeper instance is set.
        • No path is set.

      • finish

        public NodeReader finish()
        Mark as 'shouldFinish' not to schedule ZooKeeper callbacks any further.

        Note that calling this method does not remove an existing Watcher which is watching the target znode.

        Returns:
        this object.
